revision.text:
Crappy Doom is a 32-level megawad-in-progress for Zdoom by James "jimmy91" Paddock. It is an all new breed of joke wad that does not focus on Mock 2-esque style gameplay, with hideously rushed level designs, insane monster placement and farked-up ACS. While it does include silly monsters and retarded onscreen hudmessages, Crappy Doom focuses on nicely built maps, but one-color walls and retarded sprites and sounds as well.
Crappy Doom is around 5% complete at the moment. I am currently asking for contributions to the project like music and levels.
'''Current Contributors:'''
* jimmy91 (mapper/musician) * Bouncy (musician) * Mechadon (mapper)
'''Pending Contributors:''' * lizardcommando (artist)
